2091750.name: Cold Way
2091750.description:
“Cold Way” is a pixel-art platformer about a boy whose home was destroyed by evil yeti. And he has to travel through this cold, arctic world full of dangers to find and destroy him. He will have to go through a difficult path and be very careful not to die. He needs to kill enemies to collect coins from them and improve his skills.

  • Pass large, interesting levels
  • Explore the world
  • Enjoy a beautiful winter
  • Level up the character
  • Discover new skills
  • Collect coins
  • Fight with a variety of enemies
  • Don't die

About features of this game
  • 42 big levels
  • Relaxing and cozy gameplay
  • Relaxing audio
2091750.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*, 乌克兰语*, 法语*, 德语*, 意大利语*, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
